paragraphs:
WE WILL REQUIRE YOU TO CREATE A PROPER INVITATION. DRAG THE WORDS IN THE CORRECT ORDER.

BY NOW YOU SHOULD UNDERSTAND OUR SUPERIOR LANGUAGE. IF NOT, WE HAVE PROVIDED YOU WITH TRANSLATIONS TO YOUR INFERIOR LANGUAGE. FIND THOSE HINTS AND USE OUR SCANNER TO INTEGRATE THEM.
I EXPECTED YOU TO FAIL, BUT YOU HAVE COMPLETED ALL FOUR TASKS.

NOW SEND US THE SIGNAL THAT ALL IS READY. WE WILL COME TO COLLECT THE INVITATION.

AND THEN WE WILL CELEBRATE.

AND THEN WE WILL SUBJUGATE ALL HUMANS.
